skills.description: Attacks the enemy with sharp, lightning claws. Inflicts Continuous Damage for 2 turns if you get a Critical Hit.

skills.name: Solid Blades
skills.description: Increases your Attack Power and Critical Rate for 3 turns. Additionally, your Attack Bar increases by 50%.

skill_effect.name: Increase ATB
skill_effect.description: The ATK bar of ally monsters is filled by a set amount. This allows ally monsters to attack again sooner.

skill_effect.name: Increase CRI Rate
skill_effect.description: Critical Hit Rate is increased by 30%

skills.name: Assassinate
